content.p: Have you decided you would like to study physics but don't think you have the right qualifications? The School of Physics and Astronomy offers a foundation year which provides an alternative route onto our highly regarded BSc or MSci physics degrees. The Engineering and Physical Sciences Foundation year enables you to pursue your interest in physics if you lack the right subjects for direct entry, or if you have not yet achieved your full potential, to get on-track for a career in physics. If you successfully complete the course and meet the progression requirements, you will be guaranteed a place on the BSc or MSci Physics course. The foundation year is ideal for: Our online prospectus pages contain details about entry requirements and modules. There are two pathways, one for home or EU students and one for international students. Course for UK or EU students Course for international students For more information contact: Dr Philip Hawker The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquiry
